title: About 5v5
body:
I have found an issue about 5v5 teambuilder. It often take very long to wait for the opponents. 
I am just wondering why can't Riot put teambuilder players to match with the normal 5v5 players?
It will make everything easier and faster! 
What do you guys think?

replies.body:
If by normal 5v5, you mean blind pick, then there are some problems. Firstly one is happening in real time, blind pick is not waiting for another team of 5 to also pick and then match the 2 teams up. Secondly, It's just the price you are going to pay for having the lane you want. Thirdly, It would over-complicate things if people in blind pick and matched with team builder because most people in blind pick want a fast game and aren't willing to wait 5 minutes to be matched with another team.

In the end, It seems unlikely that anything is going to be done to connect the two.
Once you have the 5 people, simply add them and invite them to a normal game, simple. :)
